channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Art Ninja
channel.desc: Ricky decides he needs to explore the world with Gavin and Sarah. While they decide where to go and what to take, Ricky makes a suitcase desk tidy, a marbling collage inspired by artist Chris Ofili and a Mexican Day of the Dead lamp. They head to the airport in Gav's old car - will they make it in time for their flight, or will they be using their luggage to make a huge picture postcard instead.
